Title: Dirty Pretty Things
Actors: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kriss Dosanjh, Israel Oyelumade, Yemi Goodman Ajibade
Plot: Illegal immigrants Okwe and Senay work at a posh London hotel and live in constant fear of deportation. One night Okwe stumbles across evidence of a bizarre murder setting off a series of events that could lead to disaster or freedom.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 17 wins & 26 nominations.
